title: Self-Regulated Learning-Based Participation Assessment Strategies in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and intermediate self-regulated learning skills
context.additional_context: Advanced social sector education courses conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Students can achieve over 80% weekly learning engagement by utilizing self-regulated learning strategies
Students can identify three or more strengths and areas for improvement in their learning process using self-assessment tools
Learners can perform the process of resetting participation goals by synthesizing peer feedback and instructor guidelines at least twice.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
